Returns: The @B_android#net#Uri_E@ to pass to the streaming client, or null if an error occurred.
getPlaybackUri().Description: Retrieve the Uri used to play this stream. May throw an @B_java#lang#IllegalArgumentException_E@ or an @B_java#lang#IllegalStateException_E@.

close().Description: Stop streaming this service. Further operations on this object will fail with an @B_java#lang#IllegalStateException_E@. May throw an @B_java#lang#IllegalArgumentException_E@ or an @B_java#lang#IllegalStateException_E@

getInfo().Description: Retrieve the @B_android#telephony#mbms#StreamingServiceInfo_E@ corresponding to this stream.

ClassDesc: Class used to represent a single MBMS stream. After a stream has been started with @B_android#telephony#MbmsStreamingSession#startStreaming_E@, this class is used to hold information about the stream and control it.
